socorro_links.comment_text:

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/ca8649f4-5e13-4854-928f-676e30250923

Reason:
```
SIGSEGV / SEGV_MAPERR
```

Top 10 frames:

```
5  libxul.so  mozilla::PresShell::HandleEvent(nsIFrame*, mozilla::WidgetGUIEvent*, bool, ns...  layout/base/PresShell.cpp:7646
```
